abstract: Microsoft’s new online head, Qi Lu, is an engineer. It suggests the company is trying to copy Google’s engineer-driven culture.
snippet: Microsoft’s new online head, Qi Lu, is an engineer. It suggests the company is trying to copy Google’s engineer-driven culture.
lead_paragraph: The choice of Qi Lu to run Microsoft’s online services division offers the clearest picture yet about Steven A. Ballmer’s vision for the company’s online effort. Its colors are blue, red, yellow and green and it is spelled G-O-O-G-L-E.
